name: Young Green Dragon
movement: 40 ft. walk, 80 ft. fly, 40 ft. swim
description: A Young Green Dragon has emerald-green scales that camouflage it in forests or jungles, and it uses lies and deceit to manipulate others. It has a long serpentine body, sharp claws, and a fearsome bite.
memorable: This dragon's use of fear and manipulation, alongside its poisonous breath, makes it a terrifying adversary.
goals: It seeks to control weaker creatures and expand its territory.
relations: It often interacts with other dragons and holds dominion over weaker creatures.
environment: Forested or jungle areas where it can ambush its prey.
strengths: High mobility with flying and swimming abilities, as well as resistance to poison damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to coordinated attacks by adventurers who can exploit its weaknesses.
attacks: Multiattack with a strong bite and slashing claws, along with a devastating poisonous breath weapon.
most_powerful_ability: Poison Breath, which deals significant area damage and can terrify opponents.
senses: Has blindsight out to 30 feet and a high passive Perception of 17.
skills: Expert in deception, perception, and stealth, allowing it to excel in combat and social encounters.
additional_information: Amphibious: can breathe air and water.
Woodland Stalker: advantage on Stealth checks in forested areas.
Innate spellcasting with ability-based on Charisma.
Hallucinogenic Gas that can frighten nearby creatures.
High hit points and armor class enhance its durability.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with spells like animal messenger and tongues, usable three times per day.
test_queries: devious dragon that blends in forests
manipulative dragon that controls weaker creatures
young green dragon with hallucinogenic gas
